category.name: Integration.CATIA
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CATIA_ignorenode_instance_description
preference.preference_description: Determine Which action should be proceed when the instance description of an occurrence in CATIA contains the IgnoreNode key word. If the preference is set to true, if the instance description of an occurrence in CATIA contains IgnoreNode key word, the instance won't be traited If the preference is set to false, IgnoreNode key word will be taking into account for broken icon only.
